citations.narrative:
The licensee has not developed, documented or followed an appropriate contingency plan as required. The contingency
plan is necessary to ensure that animals are provided with humane handling, treatment, transportation, housing, and care
in the event of an emergency or disaster.
TO BE CORRECTED BY: JANUARY 19, 2023

(b) For current licensees and registrants, the contingency plan must be in place by July 5, 2022.
The licensee did not have the contingency plan in place by July 5, 2022 as required. Licensee must develop, document
and follow an appropriate contingency plan.
TO BE CORRECTED BY: JANUARY 19, 2023
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.134(a) 
   
Contingency planning. 
The licensee has not developed, documented or followed an appropriate contingency plan as required.  The contingency 
plan is necessary to ensure that animals are provided with humane handling, treatment, transportation, housing, and care 
in the event of an emergency or disaster. 
TO BE CORRECTED BY:  JANUARY 19, 2023 
2.134(b) 
   
Contingency planning. 
(b) For current licensees and registrants, the contingency plan must be in place by July 5, 2022. 
The licensee did not have the contingency plan in place by July 5, 2022 as required.  Licensee must develop, document 
and follow an appropriate contingency plan. 
TO BE CORRECTED BY:  JANUARY 19, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
